short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ERP Chrome Extension for StrongSD company

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ERP tracker plugin is developed for StrongQA/StrongSD employees to help them track work-time easily inside the Chrome browser.
Plugin includes:
    * Time Tracker
    * Background updates of tracking status
    * Integrations with GitHub issues & Jira tasks
StrongQA/StrongSD account is required for employees in order to use this plugin.
